page.title: 14 Housing
page.content: The population of Whitstable is 27896, with an above average percentage of elderly residents.Many homes in the central part of the town are Victorian or early 20th century.Most of these are terraced houses.1 modern block of terraced houses has just been completed.There is a 12 storey block of flats and 3 blocks (3 storeys) for senior citizens.There are also masonettes where 1 family lives above the other.The majority of houses are semi-detached.Most bungalows and detached houses are situated in Tankerton and Seasalter.There are 4 council estates,1 of bungalows for old people.Houses in the area are mainly owner occupied.Being a commuter belt new housing estates are continually developing.Average prices are:flats Â£25000;Terraced houses Â£25000-Â£30000; semi-detached Â£35000;detached Â£40000+.
